BBEX3.A.ZAR.EUR.CA.AA.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in South Africa / EUR 1 = ZAR ... (buying)
Source: Since March 2004 Standard Bank, Johannesburg  1999 - February 2004 Standard Corporate & Merchant Bank, Johannesburg
Methodology: 1999 and 2000 calculated on the basis of daily exchange rates, from 2001 to 2011 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates and from 2012 on the basis of month-end rates.
